list.name: Changes
list.comment: fixed all broken and outdated tests so they now test on the current implementation, changed all test_.py files so they have more correct names and made a share-file for all backend tests, but kept some to not make test_backend.py to messy after more tests have been added.

task.summary:
configured the functions add_locker and add_multiple_lockers so they now adds and checks for combi_id(frontend id) so the id never overlaps and checks that the numbers interates normally.
this id takes the locker_room.name and combines it with numbers from 1 to n.
also fixed this for the html page, so it changes Locker ID to be the combi_id for each locker_room.

refactored and sorted the code so that all get-functions are in statistic.py, gave all api-calls with a backend return, and made all backend returns into json format to correctly display what has been done so the user can see the messages.
fixed some error_handler stuff.

changed all exceptions to go through ErrorHandler.py first.
corrected some error texts to fit norwegian.
Changed the frontend text to norwegian
Changed the frontend text to norwegian#2

fixed all broken and outdated tests so they now test on the current implementation, changed all test_.py files so they have more correct names and made a share-file for all backend tests, but kept some to not make test_backend.py to messy after more tests have been added.

MESSAGE.value:
configured the functions add_locker and add_multiple_lockers so they now adds and checks for combi_id(frontend id) so the id never overlaps and checks that the numbers interates normally.
this id takes the locker_room.name and combines it with numbers from 1 to n.
also fixed this for the html page, so it changes Locker ID to be the combi_id for each locker_room.

refactored and sorted the code so that all get-functions are in statistic.py, gave all api-calls with a backend return, and made all backend returns into json format to correctly display what has been done so the user can see the messages.
fixed some error_handler stuff.

changed all exceptions to go through ErrorHandler.py first.
corrected some error texts to fit norwegian.
Changed the frontend text to norwegian
Changed the frontend text to norwegian#2

fixed all broken and outdated tests so they now test on the current implementation, changed all test_.py files so they have more correct names and made a share-file for all backend tests, but kept some to not make test_backend.py to messy after more tests have been added.
